title: Southern Charm: Charlotte Hornets' Nest
description:
This week on Southern Charm, Venita tries to reason with Olivia — which doesn't work out so well — and the guys head up to Charlotte. Taylor should have nothing to worry about. Nothing at all!

Don't just listen to the episode; watch it too! Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/69441543
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
